attributes.action: Do not impose mandatory vaccination against covid19 on any kind of professionals
attributes.additional_details: Those healthcare workers who wish to be vaccinated agains covid 19 should be able to have the vaccine. Those healthcare workers who are at great risk to catch the covid 19 but has chosen not to have the vaccine should be regulately tested but remain the freedom to make their own healthcare choices and the wright not to loose their job because of their choices.
attributes.background: Having a vaccine against covid 19 should always remain one's personl choice including for healthcare workers. Do not impose mandatory vaccination against covid 19 on any kind of professionals!

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
